settings.name: Threshold speed
settings.description: Define the threshold speed (in m/h) within which a female restricts its movement while calving. By default, the average speed for each track is used.

settings.name: Time window used to calculate change in movement
settings.description: Provide the minimum time duration (in hours) that your animals need to be present at a cluster for including it in your results. Defaults to 72. This window must exceed the fix rate.

settings.name: Known calving events
settings.description: Optionally, upload a local file with known calving events to include in outputs. See the app README for the expected format.
